other_tests.findings: The appendix is hyperemic, fluid-filled and dilated measuring up to 11 mm in diameter with periappendiceal fluid and inflammation. A hypodensity in the left liver lobe measuring 6 mm, possibly a simple cyst or ciliated foregut cyst. A lesion in the right adrenal gland measuring 2.5 x 1.5 x 2.7 cm, incompletely characterized. Small amount of pelvic free fluid noted within the cul-de-sac.
